snippet: At an event on Monday supporting Christine C. Quinn’s mayoral campaign, the publisher of a community newspaper slapped two Quinn supporters, a state senator and a campaign intern.
abstract: George Capsis, publisher of community paper WestView News, slaps State Sen Brad Hoylman and a campaign intern at Christine C Quinn's mayoral campaign event; assault occurs after former State Sen Thomas K Duane touted Quinn's fight to save St Vincent's hospital, which Capsis and other protesters disputed; Capsis says he was angry because his dying wife was sent to hospital in Bronx following closing, making it hard to visit her.
lead_paragraph: At an event on Monday supporting Christine C. Quinn’s mayoral campaign, the publisher of a community newspaper slapped two Quinn supporters, a state senator and a campaign intern.

headline.main: Man Slaps Two Supporters at Quinn Event
headline.print_headline: Man Slaps Two Supporters at Quinn Event
